headline: PEAC Solutions expands UK tech team with two senior appointments
summary: New hires bring additional expertise in technology financing and channel strategy as PEAC prepares to grow its UK presence

headline: Clinch Appoints Former McDonald's CMO Tariq Hassan to Board of Advisors
summary: Clinch, the Agentic AI platform for omnichannel campaign orchestration, today announced the appointment of Tariq Hassan, former Chief Marketing and Customer Experience Officer of McDonald's, to its global Advisory Board.

raw.headline: Clinch Appoints Former McDonald's CMO Tariq Hassan to Board of Advisors
raw.summary: Clinch, the Agentic AI platform for omnichannel campaign orchestration, today announced the appointment of Tariq Hassan, former Chief Marketing and Customer Experience Officer of McDonald's, to its global Advisory Board.

headline: Large Format Printer Market Forecast Report 2025-2030, with Case Studies of OK to Colour, Canon, Simpsons Printing, Fujifilm, Wednesbury Commercial & Car Ltd (WCC), and Mimaki
summary: Growth in the LFP market is fueled by the expanding construction and architectural sectors needing precise CAD prints. Key drivers include digital workflow adoption and increased demand for high-quality outputs. Wired connectivity leads due to its reliability in high-volume environments. The decor segment is projected to have the highest CAGR, bolstered by personalized interior solutions. China heads growth in Asia Pacific, driven by infrastructure growth and digital transformation initiatives.

headline: 3 Reasons HPQ is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: HP has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small loss of 4.5% while holding steady at $27.52. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 14.9% gain during that period.
